NK103(pe)006:1: // pra kri ti s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ////
NK103(pe)006:4: sarba gata th+aa ga taa khab+hisarba kad+harmapra ngakriti yo ca
NK103(pe)006:5: gab+y+aa chanan+ta raa jasam skri tapu nya nambya taka ra
NK103(pe)006:6: na n+aa ma / bod skad du /
NK103(pe)006:7: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos ka'khor 'das brjod bya thams
NK103(pe)006:8: cad kyigdod nas ma skyes pas rang khabzhin byang chub
NK103(pe)006:9: kyi sems dus gsum gyi de gabzhin gshegs pa thams
NK103(pe)006:10: cad kyithugs kyi dgongs ngapamkhyen pa'i ye shes ma nor
NK103(pe)006:11: rnal cama'i don la rig pas 'byor pa'iyang rab kyi
NK103(pe)006:12: bsam chapa yul 'dus byas min pas gtan pa mtshungs
NK103(pe)006:13: pa med pas khyad par can duye nas gnas pas
NK103(pe)006:14: 'dus ja ma byasparnyalung ta sgro skur dang bral bar
NK103(pe)006:15: nges so // skal ldan la gsal bar bstan pa zhes rjod byed bya ba /
NK103(pe)006:16: bcom ldan 'das blos bsam pa bral ba'i ting nge
NK103(pe)006:17: 'dzin la ngang gis gnas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa
NK103(pe)006:18: chen po la goms pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)006:19: dran ba dang rtog pa yul gyi rnam pa la cir yang g.yos kyang //
NK103(pe)006:20: de'i mtshan nyid rang gsal rnam pa ma 'gags par sprul pa ngos rang bzhin gzung med des yin //
NK103(pe)006:21: des na don deng rtogs pa'i nus pa'i mthu can gyi skyes bu'i yid ni //
NK103(pe)006:22: bde gshegs kyi dgongs pa yin pas rtogs goms des 'dud phyag 'tshal //
NK103(pe)006:23: skye rgu phal cher ni blo gros mu matha'i phyogs
NK103(pe)006:24: su lhung pas shes bya la mkhyen pa'i rtsal ma
NK103(pe)006:25: rdzogs pas ma bcos par lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i chos
NK103(pe)006:26: rnams la / nges par 'dzin pa'i mos pa dang
NK103(pe)006:27: 'dod pa'i 'dun pa dang dad pa gsum med par
NK103(pe)006:28: yang ma zad par de nyid blo'i phrag tu mi
NK103(pe)006:29: tshud pas dog pa'i bsams pas sgro 'dogs shing skur
NK103(pe)006:31: des na 'og gi 'di ltar du snying rjes kun
NK103(pe)006:32: nas bslangs nas bkod kyang skye dgu kun la phan
NK103(pe)006:33: no zhes nges par yid brtan med kyang /
NK103(pe)006:34: slob dpon rang dang thugs kyi rigs mthun pa dngos
NK103(pe)006:35: kyi slob ma 'jam dbyangs bu dang brgyud pa'i slob
NK103(pe)006:36: ma phyi rabs dra ma chen po'i don du dgod
NK103(pe)006:37: par bya'o // rtogs pa'i lta ba yid sbyin gyi
NK103(pe)006:38: nor bu lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa las
NK103(pe)006:39: par bya'o // // che ba'i pa lngas khyad par
NK103(pe)006:40: 'phags chen por sangs rgyas su rtsal 'byin pa ni
NK103(pe)006:41: par bya'o // // // rtsol bas ma btsal bar rtogs pa'i ngang du goms pa las //
NK103(pe)006:42: dus de ma thag tu rang las 'bras bu 'char te //
NK103(pe)006:43: dper na rgya mtsho rkyen gyis rnyogs pa las //
NK103(pe)006:44: rkyen gyis ma bcos pa'i ngang du bzhag pa yis //
NK103(pe)006:45: rnyog pa rang sangs te chu dang ba la //
NK103(pe)006:46: nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan ngang gis 'chang ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)006:47: dus ye nas 'bras bu lhun gyis grub cing 'khrul pa rnam par dag pa'i don te //
NK103(pe)006:48: rang rig rang gsal dus yul dang yul can dbyer med yul med du rtogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)006:49: so la ma yengs par rang rang du bzhag pas de la //
NK103(pe)006:50: sku gsum lhun gyis grub ste rtsol ba med pas bde ba che 'os //
NK103(pe)006:51: dper na rgyal bus dge don gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)006:52: phyi'i rgya mtsho'i gling las yid sbyin gyi nor bu rin po che blangs te //
NK103(pe)006:53: rgyal bu'i ye nas yod pa'i yon tan de nor bu de'i rkyen gyis bslang nas //
NK103(pe)006:54: 'gro ba'i 'dod pa skong zhing dbul ba sel de 'dod pa'i bde bas tshim pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)006:55: goms pas rtogs pa'i ngang du gnas pa las //
NK103(pe)006:56: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rang chas su gnas pa shar ba ni //
NK103(pe)006:57: sngon gyi gnas dran pa lha'i mig rna ba sems
NK103(pe)006:58: shes pa mngon shes drug dang ye shes lnga stong
NK103(pe)006:60: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las dang //
NK103(pe)006:61: thun mong dang khyad par gyi mtshan so gnyis dpe
NK103(pe)006:62: byad brgyad cu mi 'jigs pa stobs ma 'dres pa
NK103(pe)006:63: la sogs pa'i yon rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes
NK103(pe)006:66: byams pa la sogs tshad med bzhis 'gro don btsal ba med par 'grub pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:67: dper na dpag bsam gyi shing dang bum pa bzang po dang //
NK103(pe)006:68: nor bu rin chen gyi yon tan rang chas su shar ba dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)006:69: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i skyon rnams ma spangs par sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)006:70: rang gzhan gyi don grub ste nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i sa las grol lo //
NK103(pe)006:71: rten 'brel lugs bzlog gis ma bkag kyang skye ba dang 'gag pa las grol //
NK103(pe)006:72: rang rgyal gyi yid sbyin bde ba'i mchog gi sa las grol lo //
NK103(pe)006:73: sgrib pa gnyis ma sbyangs tshogs gnyis ma bsags kyang don la gnas pas grol bas //
NK103(pe)006:74: 'bras bu lhun gyi rdzogs te sbyang bgrod med pas mdo sde'i sa las grol lo //
NK103(pe)006:75: lus ngag gi bya ba'i las las grol kyang che ba'i yon tan rdzogs pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:76: gong 'og gnyis la lta spyod ma brten kyang phyogs med kyi ngang du yon tan rdzogs pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:77: bsam gtan gyi yan lag mngon byang lnga cho 'phrul bzhi ste dgu yis gos pa las grol la //
NK103(pe)006:78: yang na lha dang bdag tha dad bden pa gnyis su lta ba las grol nas yon tan shar //
NK103(pe)006:80: rtogs pa'am rmi ba blang dor 3rnam rtog nyid blang
NK103(pe)006:81: dor gyi rtsol ba med pas bde chen gnas pa
NK103(pe)006:82: la // ye shes pa phyi dang dam tshig pa
NK103(pe)006:83: nang na mi mnga' bas phar spro bsdu ba med
NK103(pe)006:84: la // // chos thams cad chos nyid de bzhin nyid de min par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)006:85: thub phyi pa pa'i rgyud kyi bsam gtan las grol ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:86: bskyed rim ril gyis sa las rim gcig car rdzogs par btsal ba dang bral la //
NK103(pe)006:87: de kun bsnyen pa dang nye bsnyen gcig spros tshogs
NK103(pe)006:88: sgrub pa dang sgrub chen a li rnam pa bzhis
NK103(pe)006:89: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu 'grub mi
NK103(pe)006:90: byed // de kun gsung thugs sku'i cho ga lnga
NK103(pe)006:91: dang yan lag gi thabs shes rab mi zad pa
NK103(pe)006:92: ye shes kyi dal dang sngags kyi yan lag lnga
NK103(pe)006:93: dang gos rgyan bza' btung glu tshig bro gar a
NK103(pe)006:94: l+ai ka l+ai ste yo byad lnga ste lnga gsum
NK103(pe)006:95: po rnams kyis btsal bas 'bras bu 'grub pa ma
NK103(pe)006:96: yin pas ma h+aa'i bsam gtan las ye nas rang
NK103(pe)006:97: byed // grol ba'o // rdzogs rim chu la nya
NK103(pe)006:98: ldang gi tshul du lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa gtsor
NK103(pe)006:100: snang ba dbyings dang ye shes gnyis rgyu 1'bras 2su sgom pa dang bral la //
NK103(pe)006:101: wa dang cang shes la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs kyi grangs nyer gsum la rag ma las par //
NK103(pe)006:102: phyogs ris med pa'i bde ba chen por ye nas
NK103(pe)006:103: rdzogs pa dang 'jal bas a nu las grol lo
NK103(pe)006:104: // che ba lngas rtsol bcas las che ba'i dpag dka' bas zab mo yi //
NK103(pe)006:105: yon tan mu mtha' cir yang brjod cing basngagasa pa med //
NK103(pe)006:106: don bzhi pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub kyang rtog pas mi bskyed de //
NK103(pe)006:107: rtsol ba'i bya ba med pas rang sa'i grol ba'ang 'dir sgrol ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:108: rnam pa sgyu ma rang bzhin spros bral mtshan nyid rang rig rnams //
NK103(pe)006:109: rtsol med kyi bde ba chen por ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas lugs de //
NK103(pe)006:110: rgyal ba'i lung dang bla ma'i man ngag dang rang rig pa'i nyams dang tshad ma gsum kyis //
NK103(pe)006:111: rtogs pa'i ngang du goms par byed dgos pas //
NK103(pe)006:112: de'i 'thad pa yang ye nas gnas pa'i gnas lugs de las //
NK103(pe)006:113: ma rtogs pa dang log par brtags pa des na shes pa'i rgyud la'ang //
NK103(pe)006:114: 'khrul pa'i ngang rtog gi shugs nyid stobs drag pas //
NK103(pe)006:115: gshis kyi yin lugs rtogs pa'i ngang du ma goms na //
NK103(pe)006:116: de ngo shes te rtogs pa tsam gyis 'bras bu mthar ma phyin no //
NK103(pe)006:117: gshis de rtogs nas de'i ngang du blo gnas pa de la ni //
NK103(pe)006:118: gnas lugs mkhyen pa'i bsam pa'i klong du chos thams cad gyur te yengs ba med pas //
NK103(pe)006:119: bsam gtan chen po bsgom bya sgom byed kyi rtsol ba dang bral ba yin no //
NK103(pe)006:120: yengs pa'i dogs med par rtogs pa'i klong chen por halas mi g.yo ba //
NK103(pe)006:121: de dang 'bral ba med pas rtogs pa don gyi gzungs chen po dang a ldan pas //
NK103(pe)006:122: rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngang du gnas pa ni ting hange 'dzin akyi mchog go //
NK103(pe)006:123: rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyi 'khrul pa'i rba rlabs rang sar zhi 1ste //
NK103(pe)006:124: gnas lugs bde chen gyi ngang du gnas pas skye lugs gsum ma spangs pas 0lhag /
NK103(pe)006:125: shes bya'i yul med par shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs //
NK103(pe)006:126: pa rnams dbyer med par rang rig pa gcig gi ngang 0du rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)006:129: ji ltar lta ba rtogs par byed pa'i don du de'i thabs brtson pas //
NK103(pe)006:130: rgyal ba'i bka' dang gzhung lugs rgya mtsho tsam la mkhas shing rtogs pa gsal yang //
NK103(pe)006:131: de'i ngang du goms 2pa'i mtshan ma zil 1gyis gnon pa dang rgyan dang bral na //
NK103(pe)006:132: rnam rtog mtshan ma'i chu klung la rtogs pa des sgrol bar nus pa ma yin te //
NK103(pe)006:133: bden nges par 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa'i lcags las rtogs pas grol kyang //
NK103(pe)006:134: 'dzin pa'i bag chags thog ma med pa nas bsags pa mthug po yis //
NK103(pe)006:135: yang nas yang du goms ni pa'i lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)006:137: mngal 2gyi dang sgo ngas 1bsgribs 12pa dang mtshungs so //
NK103(pe)006:138: rtogs pa nges par goms pa gdeng du ma gyur na //
NK103(pe)006:139: thos pa'i tshig zin la don go zhing rtogs par byas kyang //
NK103(pe)006:140: don la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa las kyis 'khor ba'i rgyu //
NK103(pe)006:141: 'dun pa drag pos snying po rnal ma la mos par byas na //
NK103(pe)006:142: de las kyi 'brel pas skye ba gzhan du mjal ba'i gzungs thag tsam las //
NK103(pe)006:143: dus bskal par bka' gzhung la sbyangs kyang 'bras bu mthar ma phyin te //
NK103(pe)006:144: bcud 'dus pas snying po ma bcos pas rnal ma'i snod ldan du 'gyur ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:145: ye nas gnas pa'i don rig par shar nas //
NK103(pe)006:146: rtogs pa de yi so la ma yengs par //
NK103(pe)006:147: snying po rnal ma gzhi don gyi rgyud //
NK103(pe)006:148: de las sel med par rtogs pa'i klong du gnas pa tsam la sgom zhes btags so //
NK103(pe)006:149: de yi mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar sems na //
NK103(pe)006:150: gshis kyi gnas lugs nyid dgos pa gnyis yod pas ming btags pa yin lhun grub gsum du kyi //
NK103(pe)006:151: phyogs su 'di 'drar brjod pa'i ming gis gnas med pas //
NK103(pe)006:152: don der blo gnas pa'i nyams dang 'dir de 2bzhin no //
NK103(pe)006:153: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid ngag tu brjod par bya ba min kyang //
NK103(pe)006:154: dper na bu ram gyi ro la mngar bar ming btags pa ltar //
NK103(pe)006:155: du khong du chud pas 'on kyang mi mthun par
NK103(pe)006:156: 'dren pas rmongs la brda yi don mtshon nus pa'i
NK103(pe)006:157: phyir // de yang brda byed pa'i dus na don
NK103(pe)006:158: rang mtshan la dmigs dang sgra rang mtshan las byung
NK103(pe)006:160: sgra don spyi'i rnam par 'brel te brda ston pa
NK103(pe)006:161: po dang gzhan dag mthun par gsal bar snang ba'i
NK103(pe)006:163: grags pa'i 'di'i ming 'di yin zhes sgra yis mngon
NK103(pe)006:164: par zhen te de ltar yan lag lnga'i tshul du
NK103(pe)006:166: brjod na bde ba dang gsal ba dang ngos gzung med pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:167: thun mong gi tshor ba bde ba thams cad las //
NK103(pe)006:168: grol ba yin te tshor bas khyab pa tsam gyi bde ba min gyi //
NK103(pe)006:169: 'khor ba dang lam gyi sdug bsngal las grol te rtsol bas ma btsal bar //
NK103(pe)006:170: ye nas lhun gyis grub par gnas pas dgag sgrub kyi rtsol ba med pa'i //
NK103(pe)006:171: sems nyid ma bcos pa'i bde ba chen po ni cis kyang //
NK103(pe)006:172: mtshon par mi nus la rang la gnas pas 'bral bar kyang mi nus te //
NK103(pe)006:173: mu matha'i phyogs ris mi mnga' bas btang snyoms che //
NK103(pe)006:174: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i bde ba nyid rigs pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:175: sems nyid dus rtag tu mtha' ma bsgribs te rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)006:176: dper na nyi ma dang mar me'i 'od dang 'dra bar rang gzhan kun 'od kyis gsal ba la //
NK103(pe)006:177: dri ma rnam par dag pa'i shel dang r+ts+wa kha'i
NK103(pe)006:178: zil pa phyi nang med par gsal ba ltar du
NK103(pe)006:179: // phyi dang nang mi mnga' la kha dog gdang bar 1'od zer 'tsher bar 1gnas 11te de yang //
NK103(pe)006:180: 'di na gnas pa dang mi gnas pa med par gnas bya gnas byed las grol bar gnas //
NK103(pe)006:181: yod pa dang med pa dang gnyis dang gnyis med du mu bzhi gang ltar yang //
NK103(pe)006:182: ma yin pas ngag tu brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das pa yin ste //
NK103(pe)006:183: phyogs gcig pa gang yang ma yin mu mtha' gar yang rgya ma chad de //
NK103(pe)006:184: ma spangs la mi ldan pas dbyer med mu mtha'
NK103(pe)006:185: mnyam grol gyi ngang las ye nas 'gyur ba med
NK103(pe)006:186: pa // de yis rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dang sems can gyi //
NK103(pe)006:187: rnam rtog yul gyi rnam par bcas pa'i phyi nang gi chos rnams la //
NK103(pe)006:188: dus gsum gyi rgyun dang bcas par mkhyen pa'i skad cig ma gcig gis //
NK103(pe)006:189: ri rab la til 'bru'i grangs dang bskal chen la skad cig gi grangs du yod dang //
NK103(pe)006:190: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam phyag gi mthil gyi 'khor lo'i nang na gnas pa ltar //
NK103(pe)006:191: mtshan nyid ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par shes bya thams cad mkhyen par gsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)006:192: shes bya'i yul med par rtogs pa'i ngang du snang
NK103(pe)006:193: la rang bzhin med par sprul pa'i rnam pa rdzogs
NK103(pe)006:194: pa ni // dper na shing tog skyu ru ra
NK103(pe)006:195: rlon pa lag pa'i mthil na gnas pa lta bu'am
NK103(pe)006:196: pa ni // // 'phrul gyi me long g.ya' dag pa'i gzugs brnyan dang 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)006:197: de ltar bde ba dang gsal ba dang stong nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes //
NK103(pe)006:198: sku gsum gyi mtha' ma sprul sku las tshig tu gsungs pa brgyud pa'i tshig yin te //
NK103(pe)006:199: nges pa'i don du na de yang brjod pa sgra'i brnyan ma yin ste //
NK103(pe)006:200: lkugs 4pa'i ngag dang 'dra bar thams cad kyi gshis mkhyen la ngag tu brjod pa bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:201: mkhyen gsal ngos med dran nas gcig dang mtha' yas pas //
NK103(pe)006:202: kun la khyab 2pas ma 1 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen //
NK103(pe)006:203: bde ba chen po rang byung bas rtsol ba med la bsam mi khyab pas ngos med cing //
NK103(pe)006:204: ngang gis mi g.yo ste sgrib byed pas 'od gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:205: theg brgyad kyi rtogs pa'ii lta ba rnam bcad dgag
NK103(pe)006:206: bya dang yongs bcad bsgrub bya dang bcas pas na
NK103(pe)006:207: // dmigs pa gtad nas yengs pa dang bral ba'i
NK103(pe)006:208: mnyam bzhag dang rjes thob can gyi sgom pa la
NK103(pe)006:209: // // nyon mongs pa gnyen pos spong ba dang
NK103(pe)006:210: rten 'brel lugs bzlog gis 'gegs pa dang chos nyid
NK103(pe)006:211: du rgyud sbyong ba dang lhar sgyur ba dang thabs
NK103(pe)006:213: lta spyod nar ma son pas byis pa nyan thos pa'i blo gros tha ma pas //
NK103(pe)006:214: sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa 'gog par 'jog pa lam sgom pa'i dmigs pa'i rten du //
NK103(pe)006:215: 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags 'khor ba skyed pa'i rgyur shes pas //
NK103(pe)006:216: nang du mi gtsang ba goms pas phyi'i gzugs sdug
NK103(pe)006:217: pa zil gyis gnon pa dang de thams cad zad
NK103(pe)006:219: spang bya 'dod chags 'go gnon du spangs nas sdug bsngal 'gog par gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:220: blo gros 'bring pos rnam rtog 1'khor ba'i rgyur shes nas //
NK103(pe)006:221: de yang rlung rgyu ba la brten te skye pas na //
NK103(pe)006:222: sna bug g.yon dang nang du rgyu ba srog gi
NK103(pe)006:223: rlung dang g.yas dang phyir rgyu ba rtsol bas rlung
NK103(pe)006:225: de yang rang gi lte bar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
NK103(pe)006:226: pa'i lte bar gzhi ma'i rlung gnas pa'i mdog ni
NK103(pe)006:227: // 'ja' tshon gyi mdog gam yang na mdog dkar la 'od gsal cing zer rno la 'tsher ba //
NK103(pe)006:228: rnam pa smig rgyu ngag lta bu'i rlung zhig sna sgor sor bzhi nar gyis dbyung ste de la //
NK103(pe)006:229: yud tsam gcig gnas pa las grangs shig yid la bsngosa la //
NK103(pe)006:230: nang du nar gyis barngubasa te gzhi ma lte ba'i steng du gnas //
NK103(pe)006:231: te de yang dus yud tsam gcig gnas pa'i bar la grangs yid la bgrang ba de bzhin du //
NK103(pe)006:232: dang po snga dro la thun 0bzhir rlung khugs pa bzhi bzhi ru grangs bgrangs //
NK103(pe)006:233: phyi dro'ang 0de bzhin du bgrangs te nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga sogs //
NK103(pe)006:234: drug brgyad bcu ru khams kyi tshod bzung la dbugs 'byung rdub bgrang //
NK103(pe)006:235: rlung 1mkhris 2bad 3kan gyi dus dgong 1ka nyi phyed 2snga 3dro la //
NK103(pe)006:236: ngal bso rang ngam bla ma'am grogs kyis thun bstang ste khams bsnyam //
NK103(pe)006:237: yud tsam rlung nang du gnas pa yun bsring zhing de ma brtan gyi bar du //
NK103(pe)006:238: bying 'gro bas bcu las mi mang bar bya de
NK103(pe)006:239: nas thun che rung bskyed grangs nyung du dbri ba
NK103(pe)006:240: // de yi gang zag dang bzung ba'i phan yon dang //
NK103(pe)006:241: sngon 'gro dang grangs bzung ba dang bskyed rim dang gnas pa'i tshad dang //
NK103(pe)006:242: rtags dang brtan pa'i thabs dang skyed dbyung ba'i thabs dang //
NK103(pe)006:243: skyon dang de'i gnyen po dang mthar phyin pa'i grangs bstan pa //
NK103(pe)006:244: de yis rnam rtog bral zhing 'gog par gnas //
NK103(pe)006:245: rang rang gi gzhung ngam dgra bcom pa nyams can nam //
NK103(pe)006:246: snyan brgyud kyi gdams ngag dang ldan na de yis gang zag de gso bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:247: blo gros rab kyi du kha kun 'byung ba spyi
NK103(pe)006:248: las dang nyon mongs pa nyid 'khor ba'i rgyu ru
NK103(pe)006:249: shes pas // de las kyang gang zag gi bdag
NK103(pe)006:250: rtag pa gcig pu rang dbang du 'dzin pa las
NK103(pe)006:251: shes pas // // rtag par 'dzin pa de spang ba'i phyir du //
NK103(pe)006:252: rgyu rkyen 'dus nas byas pa'i skye 'gag gnas pa
NK103(pe)006:253: dang bcas pa'i chos kun mi rtag par bsgom pa
NK103(pe)006:254: ni // chu ri gzar po la 'bab pa'i thigs pa myur du 'gyur ba lta bu'am //
NK103(pe)006:255: rlung gis bskyod pa'i smig rgyu lta bu mi brtan pa'am //
NK103(pe)006:256: rgya mtshos lan tsh+wa bskyed nas chur thim ba ltar //
NK103(pe)006:258: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du 'du shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:259: ji tsam du skye ba de thams cad sdug bsngal du shes par bya //
NK103(pe)006:260: yul dang sems rags pa'i dang rgyun gyi gang zag gi bdag med pas //
NK103(pe)006:261: chos kyi bdag gzung ba 2'dzin pa skad cig ma 1rdul phra rab dang //
NK103(pe)006:262: der 3thim nas mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:263: de ltar bsgoms pa yis du kha 'gog pa'i bden par gnas pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:264: dge bshes la mi brten pa'am rang don du sangs rgyas 'dod pas nyan thos de la brten pas //
NK103(pe)006:265: rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi dang po mi rig pa
NK103(pe)006:266: dang brgyad pa srid pa dag dgu pa len pa
NK103(pe)006:267: ni nyon mongs pa ste rgyu la //
NK103(pe)006:268: gnyis pa 'du byed dang bcu pas srid rkyen te las su gnas rgyu rkyen des //
NK103(pe)006:269: rnam shes ming gzugs skye mched reg pa tshor ba
NK103(pe)006:270: skye ba rga shi bdun po 'bras bu sdug bsngal
NK103(pe)006:272: rgyu ma rig pa nas rim par bkag ste bsgoms
NK103(pe)006:273: pas 'bras bu yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog gi sa
NK103(pe)006:274: thob pa'o // chen po bdun dang ldan pas theg
NK103(pe)006:275: pa chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde
NK103(pe)006:277: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis la
NK103(pe)006:278: lta ba spyi'i rnam pa tsam du yongs su bcad
NK103(pe)006:279: nas // lam lngar tshogs sbyor gnyis su zhi gnas
NK103(pe)006:280: 1mthong sgom mthar lam gsum du lhag mthong 1bsgom 11ste
NK103(pe)006:281: nas // // lus tshor ba sems chos bzhi po'i
NK103(pe)006:282: mtshan nyid shes pas dran pa ni shes rab ste
NK103(pe)006:283: nas // // lhag mthong ngo // des bcad pa
NK103(pe)006:284: la nye bar rtse gcig tu bzhag pa'i zhi gnas
NK103(pe)006:285: nas // // lhag mthong ngo // ste // dge
NK103(pe)006:286: ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed cing skyes pa
NK103(pe)006:287: phyi phyir spel ba dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i
NK103(pe)006:288: chos ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa rnams
NK103(pe)006:289: spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed pa gnyis las yang
NK103(pe)006:291: rdzu 'phrul ni mngon shes lnga la bya ste de nyid yang dag par thob bar //
NK103(pe)006:292: 'gro bar byed pa'i rgyu rkang pa bzhi ni //
NK103(pe)006:293: mos pas ting nge la 'jug pa pa'i ting nge
NK103(pe)006:294: 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul
NK103(pe)006:295: gyi rkang pa dang dang brtson 'grus kyis dge ba
NK103(pe)006:296: 'phel ba'i bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa dang sems
NK103(pe)006:297: kyis sgom gyi bag chags bsags te yun ring du
NK103(pe)006:298: sgom pa dang dpyod pas chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)006:299: gtan la phebs te the tshom med pa dang /
NK103(pe)006:300: de rnams kyis ma yengs par sems rtse gcig pa'i
NK103(pe)006:301: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang gnas pa la sgrib par
NK103(pe)006:302: byed pa'i // nyes pa rnam pa lnga 'byung ba ni //
NK103(pe)006:303: dmigs pa brjed pa dang zhum rgod dang //
NK103(pe)006:304: rtsol ba dang mi rtsol ba dang le lo'o //
NK103(pe)006:305: de la le lo ni don dge ba la mi
NK103(pe)006:306: 'jug pa ste nyan pa la mi sbyor ba yin
NK103(pe)006:307: la // bsgom par bya ba'i ngag mnyan pa'i don
NK103(pe)006:308: mi dran te bsam pa'i shes rab nyams pas sgom
NK103(pe)006:309: la sbyor dus su rmongs pa ni dmigs pa brjed
NK103(pe)006:310: la // pa yin la // zhum pa dang rgod
NK103(pe)006:311: pas rmugs shing g.yengs te ting nge 'dzin la blo
NK103(pe)006:313: rtsol bas ni skyon cing g.yeng bar byed pas zhi gnas la sgrib pa yin ste //
NK103(pe)006:314: mi rtsol bas ni bying rgod mi spong bas lhag mthong la sgrib pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:315: de dag spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad bsten pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:316: dad pa dang 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang //
NK103(pe)006:317: shin tu sbyangs pas le lo sel //
NK103(pe)006:318: 'dris pa'i dngos po nyid ma brjed pa'i dran pas dmigs pa brjed pa'i nyes pa sel cir //
NK103(pe)006:319: zhum rgod gang byung rtogs pa'i shes bzhin la gnas pas zhum rgod sel la //
NK103(pe)006:320: mi rtsol ba'i gnyen por ni sems pas sems gzeng mngon par byed pa'i yid kyis bstod la //
NK103(pe)006:321: rtsol ba drags pa ni btang snyoms kyis sems mnyam
NK103(pe)006:322: pa nyid la rnal du 'dug pas mgo gnon pa'o
NK103(pe)006:323: // dang po bzhi ni brtson 'grus kyi 'dun pa
NK103(pe)006:324: yod na brtson 'grus rtsom pas 'dun pa ni gnas
NK103(pe)006:325: dang la brtson 'grus ni rten dang dad pa yod
NK103(pe)006:326: na 'dun pa 'byung bas mtshan ma dang ste mtshan
NK103(pe)006:327: ma dang rgyu don gcig go //
NK103(pe)006:328: brtson pas lus sems las su rung bas na shin tu sbyangs pa ni 'bras bu yin pas //
NK103(pe)006:329: de ltar bzhi dang ldan pa la le lo'i gnas med do //
NK103(pe)006:330: dran pa la sogs pa phyi ma bzhi ni dmigs
NK103(pe)006:331: brjed la sogs pa nyes pa bzhi dang 'gal ba
NK103(pe)006:332: // des na spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad ces bshad do //
NK103(pe)006:333: dge 1 ba dang sdig 1pa yang 2dag ni dbang
NK103(pe)006:334: po lnga dang de las bzlog 2pa'i ma dad pa
NK103(pe)006:336: dad pa gsum ni dad pa'i dge ba spel ba
NK103(pe)006:337: ni brtson 'grus kyi shes rab gsum gsal ba ni
NK103(pe)006:338: dran pa'i sems yul la mi 'phro ba ni ting
NK103(pe)006:339: nge 'dzin gyi rang spyi ma nor bar shes pa
NK103(pe)006:340: ni shes rab kyi dbang po rnams ni //
NK103(pe)006:341: thar pa'i mthong lam gyi cha dang mthun pa'i dge
NK103(pe)006:342: ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dbang byed pas dbang po
NK103(pe)006:343: yin no // yang na yid ches pa dang dang
NK103(pe)006:344: ba'i dad pas 'dod pa'i dad pa yod na nyes
NK103(pe)006:345: yin no // pa las 'byung // ngo snyam nas
NK103(pe)006:346: de yi dbang gis brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro
NK103(pe)006:347: yin no // pa las 'byung // // brtson pas bslab pa gsum bsgrub pa la dbang byed de //
NK103(pe)006:348: dran pa'i dbang bos lhag pa'i tshul khrims la dbang byed ting 'dzin gyi dbang pos //
NK103(pe)006:349: lhag pa'i sems la dbang byed shes rab kyi dbang pos lhag pa'i shes rab la dbang byed pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:350: yang na snga ma snga mas phyi ma phyi ma
NK103(pe)006:351: skye ba la dbang byed pa yis dbang po yang
NK103(pe)006:352: yin no // de ltar dbang du gyur kyang mi
NK103(pe)006:353: mthun pa'i phyogs kyis cung zad nyams pa byed de
NK103(pe)006:354: yin no // // ma dad pa dang le lo
NK103(pe)006:355: dang brjed ngas pa dang g.yeng ba dang shes bzhin
NK103(pe)006:357: chos rnams la btags pa'i ming 1dang ming gi btags
NK103(pe)006:358: pa'i brjod bya'i don rnams 1sgyu 1mar 1 shes pa'i
NK103(pe)006:359: dus na // snang ba thob pa drod dang snang ba mched pa rtse mor gnas la //
NK103(pe)006:360: dad pa la sogs pa lnga stobs su gyur na
NK103(pe)006:361: mi mthun pa'i phyogs lnga yis mi nyams pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)006:362: stobs te // btags pa'i ming rnams dang ming gis
NK103(pe)006:363: btags pa'i brjod bya don gyi chos rnams stong par
NK103(pe)006:365: de kho na yi phyogs gcig la zhugs pa bzod pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:366: de ma thag pa 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog go //
NK103(pe)006:367: mthong ba'i lam la sbyor ba'i tshe dbang yang stobs su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de //
NK103(pe)006:368: de yan chad du bskal pa grangs med gcig gis mthong lam la 'byor bar byed pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:369: mthong lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes sa
NK103(pe)006:370: dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sar gnas pa'i tshe
NK103(pe)006:371: // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan pa
NK103(pe)006:372: ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
NK103(pe)006:373: // dang // rnam khapar chos ka'byed gapa dang brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:374: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting 'dzin dang btang snyoms
NK103(pe)006:375: yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag yin pa ste
NK103(pe)006:376: // de yang rim par gnas 1dang rang bzhin 1nges 'byung 1phan 1yon dang //
NK103(pe)006:377: tha ma gsum ni nyon mongs med pa'i yan 1111lag go //
NK103(pe)006:378: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la //
NK103(pe)006:379: byang chub ces bya ste de yang chos rnams par 'byed pa 0dang sbyar ste //
NK103(pe)006:380: de 0ni gtso bo yang yin la yan lag kyang yin no go //
NK103(pe)006:381: gzhan drug po ni de'i grogs su gyur bas na byang chub kyi yan lag go //
NK103(pe)006:382: dran pas ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab skye bas gnas kyi yan lag yin la //
NK103(pe)006:383: rnam khapar chos ka'byed gapas ni chos spyi dang rang
NK103(pe)006:384: gi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pas rang bzhin gyi
NK103(pe)006:386: skye bo'i gnas las 'da' bar byed pas nges par
NK103(pe)006:387: 'byung ba'i yan lag byed pa dang po'i dga' ba
NK103(pe)006:388: des lus sems la phan pas dga' ba ni phan
NK103(pe)006:390: sems sbyangs te las su rung pa la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i g.yeng ba mi 'byung 1ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)006:391: sems rtse gcig par gnas pas mthong bas spang bar bya ba spang pa'i 2phyir dang //
NK103(pe)006:392: mthong spang spangs nas de yan chad nyon mongs pa
NK103(pe)006:393: mi 'byung ste sems yang dag pa'i rgyu btang snyoms
NK103(pe)006:394: 3su 'jog pas // 123nyon mongs med pa'i shin tu
NK103(pe)006:395: sbyangs pa'i gzhi 1ting nge gnas 2btang snyoms 2ngo bo
NK103(pe)006:396: 3su 'jog pas // yin no // sa gnyis ba
NK103(pe)006:397: dri ma med pa nas sa brgyad pa mi g.yo
NK103(pe)006:398: ba'i bar la sgom lam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
NK103(pe)006:400: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtogs 0pa dang ngag 0dang las 0kyi mtha' dang //
NK103(pe)006:401: 'tsho 0ba dang rtsol 1ba dang dran 1pa dang yang dag pa'i ting 1nge 'dzin //
NK103(pe)006:402: mthong spang dang sgom spang gi nyon mongs pa thag
NK103(pe)006:403: ring du spangs pa'i phyir na de las 'phags pa
NK103(pe)006:404: yin la // thob pa der 'gro'i rgyu'am sgo lta
NK103(pe)006:405: bu dngos su shes rab kyi bye brag la yan
NK103(pe)006:406: yin la // lag brgyad de // de yang yongs
NK103(pe)006:407: su gcod dang go 0bar byed pa dang rnam pa
NK103(pe)006:408: yin la // lag brgyad de // gsum 000gyis ni
NK103(pe)006:409: // gzhan yid ches par byed mi mthun phyogs kyi
NK103(pe)006:410: gnyen po ste lam gyi yan lag brgyad do //
NK103(pe)006:411: sa gnyis pa yan chad kyi rnam par mi rtog
NK103(pe)006:412: pa'i rjes las thob pa dag pa 'jin rten pa'i
NK103(pe)006:413: ye shes kyis lta bas chos kyi dbyings 'di ltar
NK103(pe)006:414: mthong ngo snyam du yongs su gcod pas so //
NK103(pe)006:415: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid brtags nas ma
NK103(pe)006:416: nor bar ston pa'i chos de gzhan la 'chad cing
NK103(pe)006:417: ston pas go 0bar byed pas so //
NK103(pe)006:418: ngag 0gis rgol bas the tshom dri ba'i lan ma
NK103(pe)006:419: nor cing 'brel bar smra bas thebs pas shes rab
NK103(pe)006:420: dag pa yin par gzhan yid ches //
NK103(pe)006:421: las 0kyi mtha' ni mi dge ba bcu dang bral
NK103(pe)006:422: bas tshul khrims rnam par dag par gzhan yid ches
NK103(pe)006:423: pa'o // 'tsho ba ni tshod zin pas 'tsho zhing
NK103(pe)006:424: yo byad bsnyungs pas gsog 'jog gi chags pa dang
NK103(pe)006:425: bral bar gzhan yid ches so //
NK103(pe)006:426: rtsol bas ni sgom spang gi bag la nyal gyi
NK103(pe)006:427: nyon mongs pa spong la dran 1pa yin ni rtse
NK103(pe)006:428: gcig tu // nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhum pa rgod pa gzeng bstod cing gnon la //
NK103(pe)006:429: ting nge 1'dzin gyis ni mngon shes drug mi thob pa'i sgrib pa spong ste 'thob par byed do //
NK103(pe)006:430: duh kha kun 'byung 'gog pa lam 'phags pa'i bden
NK103(pe)006:431: pa bzhi bsam gtan bzhi rtog dpyod dang bcas dpyod
NK103(pe)006:432: pa dang bcas tshor ba dga' bde btang snyoms tshad
NK103(pe)006:433: pa med pa bzhi byams snying dga' btang //
NK103(pe)006:434: snyoms 'jug bzhi nam rnam cung yod min rnam par
NK103(pe)006:435: thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
NK103(pe)006:437: stong smon mtshan rnam bar thar pa gsum yang skabs kyis lam gyi grogs tsam du gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:438: sa brgyad nas sa dgu par legs pa'i blo gros
NK103(pe)006:439: bcu pa chos kyi sprin nas bcu gcig kun tu
NK103(pe)006:440: 'od par // rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
NK103(pe)006:441: dang rgyal ba longs skus phyag brkyangs nas spyi bor
NK103(pe)006:442: 'od par // bzhag ste // byin gyis brlabs pa
NK103(pe)006:443: dang dbang bskur gis shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba
NK103(pe)006:445: rtsol med kyis 'dul ba'i dus la bab na rgyal thabs kyi brdas rang sa'i zhen pa bkrol ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:446: bdag gcig pas 'brel pas sgyur bar byed pa sngags phyi pa rnam gsum las //
NK103(pe)006:447: lus ngag gi bya ba gtsor byed pa'i lam pas gtsang ma'i zas dkar gsum mngar gsum //
NK103(pe)006:448: ras gtsang ma kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon la
NK103(pe)006:449: yar gyi tshes brgyad la sogs pa'i dus bzang la
NK103(pe)006:450: // gza' pa wa sangs dang rgyu skar rgyal la
NK103(pe)006:451: sogs pa bzang ba'i tshe yi dam lha'i gzugs brnyan
NK103(pe)006:452: // dang // gtsang ma mchod pa'i yo byad la
NK103(pe)006:453: sogs pa bsogs nas khrus gsum byas te sta gon
NK103(pe)006:454: rdzogs nas kri ya don gyi lha drug ni //
NK103(pe)006:455: stong pa chos nyid kyi las gsung gi sgra brnyan 'byung //

NK103(pe)006:457: pa de las thugs mtshan de yongs su gyur pa
NK103(pe)006:458: las chu zla lta bu'i rigs gsum gyi sku gsum
NK103(pe)006:459: po der gsal bar bsgoms nas //
NK103(pe)006:460: spyan ye shes kyis shes bya bden gnyis kun mkhyen
NK103(pe)006:461: pa'i mtha' klas nas dbu gtsug tor dbu rgyan ye
NK103(pe)006:463: bsrung ba che chung gis lus brtan par gnas nas rang gzhan gyi don rnams grub par bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:464: lha ye shes can rje bo'i tshul du spyan drangs
NK103(pe)006:465: te nam mkha' yi dmigs pa'i rten la gzugs brnyan
NK103(pe)006:466: gzud // de la 'bags btsog med pa gtsang ma'i
NK103(pe)006:467: mchod pas mchod la de ting nge mnyam par bzhag
NK103(pe)006:468: gzud // ste // lha bdag 'phro 'du'i gsal ba
NK103(pe)006:469: gsum dang ldan bzlas pa'i skyon sgra ha cang che
NK103(pe)006:470: bar ma yin chung bar mgyogs par bul bar drag
NK103(pe)006:471: par zhan par yig 'bru yan lag nyams par yengs
NK103(pe)006:472: par glal dang sbrid pa la sogs pas bar chod
NK103(pe)006:473: par rgyu ba'i sems pa dang bcu spangs la bzlas
NK103(pe)006:474: gzud // ste // te // thun gyi mtshams su
NK103(pe)006:475: ye shes la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bshags
NK103(pe)006:476: pa la sogs pa zin pa dang lha ye shes
NK103(pe)006:478: dam tshig pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas rnal 'byor pa'i spyod lam ci bder gnas par bya //
NK103(pe)006:479: nyes pa byung na yig 'bru'i grangs kyi ldab kyis bsab cing //
NK103(pe)006:480: grub rtags tshad la phebs na lha la dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:481: mthar thug gi rkyen man ngag gi snod ldan gyi
NK103(pe)006:482: rnal 'byor pa yin na rtogs pa'i rkyen rgyal thabs
NK103(pe)006:484: de yang der rim gyis bgrod dam yang na cig car du 'jug pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:485: nang gi rnal 'byor gtsor byed pa yis lus ngag gi bya byed gtso bor mi blang bar //
NK103(pe)006:486: don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngang las //
NK103(pe)006:487: me long lta bu zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du //
NK103(pe)006:488: gsung gi phyag rgya yig 'bru'i ting nge gsal bar bzhag pa las //
NK103(pe)006:489: thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su gyur pa las //
NK103(pe)006:490: gtso bo'i sku dar dang rat+na'i rgyan dang ldan pa
NK103(pe)006:491: rdzogs par bskyed pa ni mngon par byang chub pa
NK103(pe)006:492: lnga'o // ting dbang byin mchod pa'i cho 'phrul bzhi
NK103(pe)006:493: yis rgyas gdab pas bskyed pa'i bya ba rdzogs te
NK103(pe)006:494: lnga'o // // de yang lha'i rnal 'byor sku rdzogs
NK103(pe)006:495: par bskyed pas bdag gzhan gyi don grub pa yin
NK103(pe)006:496: lnga'o // // pas // de'i skyon brdag pa dang
NK103(pe)006:497: de bcos thabs drod rtags la sogs pa rang rang

NK103(pe)006:499: lta spyod gnyi ga ltar spyod pa pas lus ngag
NK103(pe)006:500: gi bya ba dang dgongs ba rnal 'byor yo ga
NK103(pe)006:501: pa // gnyi ga'i mthu las 'bras bu grub par 'dod pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:502: nang pa nyon mongs pa la rang dbang du sgyur
NK103(pe)006:503: te spyad pas grol ba thabs kyi theg pa las
NK103(pe)006:504: // bskyed pa'i rim pa gtsor byed pa rnal 'byor chen po pas //
NK103(pe)006:505: shes rab kyi dbang po yang rab mchog dang ldan
NK103(pe)006:506: pas snang stong zung 'jug dbyer med kyi ye shes
NK103(pe)006:507: la // lhun gyis grub par rim pa dang bral
NK103(pe)006:508: bar rtogs nas lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du ting
NK103(pe)006:510: bsrung du med pa dang mnyam pa'i dam tshig blang
NK103(pe)006:511: dor med pa'i spyod pa la sogs lta sgom gyi
NK103(pe)006:512: grogs su de'i rjes su mthun par cig car du

NK103(pe)006:514: goms kyi ngang nyid du lam gyi cha rkyen rnams
NK103(pe)006:515: spyod de // rdzogs pa'o // rtogs ba phra mo
NK103(pe)006:516: tsam las tshad du ma phyin te blo zhan na
NK103(pe)006:517: spyod de // rdzogs pa'o // // zhen chags can
NK103(pe)006:518: gyi gang zag la 'dod pa rang nyid grol ba'i
NK103(pe)006:519: rkyen du 'gyur ba thabs lam ni //
NK103(pe)006:520: dad pa can gyi gang zag la lhag pa gzugs
NK103(pe)006:521: brnyan du chos bco brgyad kyis 'jug pa'i sgo dang
NK103(pe)006:522: phan par 'i dbang bcu bskur ba'i gnas la /

NK103(pe)006:524: sgom gyi dbang byin te gsang sngags mnyan la lha
NK103(pe)006:525: bsgom // gzhan don nus pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan
NK103(pe)006:526: na 'chad pa dang phrin las kyi dbang byin te
NK103(pe)006:527: rgyud bshad cing phrin las bzhi brtsam par bya //
NK103(pe)006:528: rang gzhan gnyis ka'i don nus pa'i brtson 'grus dang
NK103(pe)006:529: ldan na rdo rje rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i gnas
NK103(pe)006:530: la // spyod par nus pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan
NK103(pe)006:531: na dam rjas rgyur kun la spyod pa gsang dbang
NK103(pe)006:533: rig par'i brtul zhugs dang ldan na shes rab ye
NK103(pe)006:534: shes kyis bde stong mngon sum par ngo sprad pa
NK103(pe)006:535: dang ldan // mnyam pa nyid kyi brtul zhugs rdzogs
NK103(pe)006:536: na bde ba chen po'i dbang gis brtan par bya'o
NK103(pe)006:537: dang ldan // // zhen chags can de lta bu
NK103(pe)006:538: min na cho ga lnga yo byad lnga sngags kya
NK103(pe)006:539: yan lag lnga ste grol lam /
NK103(pe)006:540: rim gyis pas 'bras bu smin par bya ba de
NK103(pe)006:541: yang ma h+aa rang gi gzhung gi rtsa rgyud bshad
NK103(pe)006:542: rgyud rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma dag na /
NK103(pe)006:543: rgyas par gnas pas legs par nan tan du bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:544: 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i lam gyi mchog yin te //
NK103(pe)006:545: de yang rim gyis sgom pa ni stong pa nyid
NK103(pe)006:546: kyi ting nge 'dzin kyis dngos po'i mtshan ma zil
NK103(pe)006:547: gyis mnan nas // mi 'byed pa'i thugs rje ye
NK103(pe)006:548: shes rang gsal sgyu mas zung 'jug gi don la
NK103(pe)006:549: gyis mnan nas // mtshams sbyar nas // snang stong
NK103(pe)006:550: zung 'jug phra mo'i ting nges ye ge la sems
NK103(pe)006:551: sbyang ste sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:552: lus kyi rtog pa'i yan lag la sangs rgyas stong
NK103(pe)006:553: la sogs par lnga la phyag rgya lnga bcur spros
NK103(pe)006:555: pa la dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas tshad 'dzin
NK103(pe)006:556: khyab par gdal phyir zhi khro tshom bu gcig gsum
NK103(pe)006:557: lnga pa'i tshogs kyi dal bsgrubs nas //
NK103(pe)006:558: rjes thob yo byad lnga la spyod pas la dor te zag bcas kyi nus pa rdzogs par bya //
NK103(pe)006:559: las kyi rnam smin las grub pa'i lus 'di dang bcas pa'am srid pa bar ma do la //
NK103(pe)006:560: nges par chos nyid rang mtshan mthong ba'i tshe dbang gi rig pa 'dzin pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:561: rtsa ba thob pa lha mi gang yin pa rdo
NK103(pe)006:562: rje'i lus su gyur pa las sna tshogs su sprul
NK103(pe)006:563: nus rgyu'i sa dang po la gnas pa dang skal
NK103(pe)006:564: ba mnyam la // lus la rig pa'i stobs zhugs
NK103(pe)006:565: pas na lo brgya nas bcu drug pa'i lus su
NK103(pe)006:566: bsnur cing lo stong drug bargya'am bskal pa grangs med
NK103(pe)006:567: ba mnyam la // du gnas te // rdo rje'i
NK103(pe)006:568: lus de las grol na rang gi yi dam gyi
NK103(pe)006:569: rigs lnga gang yin kyi lha'i sku //
NK103(pe)006:570: ye shes sgyu ma'i lus can gyi lha'i dal gyi
NK103(pe)006:571: grangs dang sgom pa'i rtsol bas ting nge la gnas
NK103(pe)006:572: // rgyu'i theg pa'i brgyad pa'i sar skal ba mnyam
NK103(pe)006:573: kyang khyad par ni zung 'jug mi nub pa'i rgyal
NK103(pe)006:575: yi dam gyi rigs kyi cha lugs dang lha grangs
NK103(pe)006:576: can bsgoms pa las grol na sku lnga lhun gyis
NK103(pe)006:577: grub pa'i cha lugs su gnas la //
NK103(pe)006:578: dbang po yang rab kyis gcig char du rtogs pa
NK103(pe)006:579: dang rtogs pa'i skal ba mnyam kyang 'dir goms pas
NK103(pe)006:581: rgyu'i bcu pa'i sa dang skal ba 'am mu tshod
NK103(pe)006:582: 'dra la mnyam bzhag la khyad med kyang rjes thob
NK103(pe)006:583: yod pas rgyal ba sku lnga las dman //
NK103(pe)006:584: rjes thob de las grol na kun tu 'od pad+ma
NK103(pe)006:585: spyan yi ge 'khor lo'i sa gsum sku chos la
NK103(pe)006:587: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtsor byed rjes su rnal 'byor pas //
NK103(pe)006:588: blo yang rab kyis snang ba dbyings dang rig pa
NK103(pe)006:589: ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen tu rtogs
NK103(pe)006:590: la // rgyu ni snang ba chos kyi dbyings su bsgoms pa las //
NK103(pe)006:591: 'bras bu dran rtog rim pa'i ye shes nyid du 'char //
NK103(pe)006:592: ba gnyis 'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen gyi ngang du bsgom mo //
NK103(pe)006:593: sngar bstan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bzhin du de'i rjes su rim gyis goms par byed pas ni //
NK103(pe)006:594: so skye nas sangs rgyas su phyin par byed pas
NK103(pe)006:595: lam lnga tshogs 1sog pa dang mthong lam la sbyor
NK103(pe)006:597: rnal 'byor lnga ste sngags kyi gnyis med kyi don
NK103(pe)006:598: la mos shing 'dun pas sems pa'i ltung ba dang
NK103(pe)006:599: mi ltung ba'i rigs chen 'byed pa'i //
NK103(pe)006:600: dbyer med kyi don mthong bas dbugs chen dang po
NK103(pe)006:601: 'byin pa'i rgyal bas sgra brnyan du lung bstan chen
NK103(pe)006:602: thob pa'i bslab pa dang ye shes kyi rtsal chen
NK103(pe)006:604: tshig gi rjes su yid la byed pa'i 11lta ba
NK103(pe)006:605: dang sgom pa'i tshogs sog pa'i bya ba las kyi
NK103(pe)006:606: spyod pa'o // de kho na nyid mthong la ma
NK103(pe)006:607: rag pas bar chad med pa'i lta ba dang yi
NK103(pe)006:608: ge dang phyag rgya'i 'phro 'du byed de dmigs pa
NK103(pe)006:609: gcig las mi 'gyur par bsgom pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:610: brtson 'grus kyis phyogs gcig pa'i spyod pas gnas par byed do //
NK103(pe)006:612: ji bzhin pa mngon sum du rtogs pa'i lta ba dang /
NK103(pe)006:613: 'khor bar yongs su mi ldog pa'i //
NK103(pe)006:614: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab mthun pa mi dmigs pa'i spyod par gnas so //
NK103(pe)006:615: mtshan mas mi g.yo ba'i lta ba dang thams cad
NK103(pe)006:616: gnyis med de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba'i ting
NK103(pe)006:617: nge 'dzin dang // yang dag 'jog las mi g.yo ba'i spyod pa la gnas so //
NK103(pe)006:618: lam tha ma ni ltos nas mthar thug pa'i lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:619: rig pa'i ye shes kyi thugs rjes zin pas kun
NK103(pe)006:620: tu gsal bar khyab pas snang gi ting nge 'dzin
NK103(pe)006:621: bya btsal med par mthar phyin pa'i spyod pa la
NK103(pe)006:622: gnas so // lam lnga po de las sa bcur
NK103(pe)006:623: gyes pa'i dang po tshogs lam la gnyis su gyes
NK103(pe)006:624: gnas so // te // rgyu rkyen gyis sngags su
NK103(pe)006:625: blo 'gyur yang rkyen dbang gis rigs ma nges pa'i
NK103(pe)006:626: sa sems brgyad la rten pa sa gong ma'i gzhi
NK103(pe)006:627: ru gyur pa yis de la rten cing gong du
NK103(pe)006:628: gnas so // te // skyed pas // gnyis pa
NK103(pe)006:629: sbyor lam la gsum ste brtson pas gal chen sngags
NK103(pe)006:631: 'dir sdod sngags kyi bslab pa'i mtha' bcu la rgyun
NK103(pe)006:632: du slob pa'i sa dang bslabs pas ye shes 'phel
NK103(pe)006:633: ba'i bsod nams mi zad pa'i gter gyi yon dang
NK103(pe)006:634: ldan pa'i sa'o // gsum pa mthong ba'i don la
NK103(pe)006:635: rten pas sa gong ma rnams khyad par skyed du
NK103(pe)006:636: ldan pa'i sa'o // 'gro ba'i sa'o // bzhi pa
NK103(pe)006:637: sgom lam la ting nge la dmigs pas mthar lam
NK103(pe)006:639: tha ma mthar lam la gsum ste gnyis med kyi
NK103(pe)006:640: don la rig pa gnas pa rkyen dbang du mi
NK103(pe)006:642: phyi nang kun la gdal ba'i chos nyid kyi don gsal ba'i sa dang /
NK103(pe)006:643: sa'i rim pa kun rdzogs pa'i spyi bor phyin cing chib pa'i sa'o //
NK103(pe)006:644: sa dang po la sngags kyi de kho na nyid
NK103(pe)006:645: la ming tsam du 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang rtsol
NK103(pe)006:646: bas bya ba byed pa'i sgom dang //
NK103(pe)006:647: bsod nams kyi dpung gis rnam par dkar ba'i tshogs la spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:649: chos nyid yid la byed pa'i lta ba dang las
NK103(pe)006:650: kyi bag chags kyi dug 'joms pa sman gyi ting
NK103(pe)006:651: nge 'dzin dang // dag ma dag phra men du spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:653: de 0kho na nyid mthong la ma rag pa'i thag pa'i lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:654: rin 1chen myu gu'i ting nge 'dzin dang legs nyes stobs 'gyed pas brtson 0'grus kyi spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:655: gsang sngags kyi bslab pa gcig pu la lta ba dang /
NK103(pe)006:656: zag bcas kyi tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
NK103(pe)006:657: bya ba rtse gcig pa yi spyod pa ni sa bzhi pa'i yin no //
NK103(pe)006:658: zag med du sbyor ba la bar chad med par
NK103(pe)006:659: lta ba dang rtse gcig 'phro ba'i ting nge dang
NK103(pe)006:660: // bslab pa mthar chub cing de dang mi 'bral
NK103(pe)006:661: bar btang snyoms rgyun gyi spyod pa ni sa lnga
NK103(pe)006:662: // pa'o // dbyings ye shes gnyis med kyi don
NK103(pe)006:663: mngon sum du rtogs pa 1yi 1lta 1ba ting 1
NK103(pe)006:664: // pa'o // nge 'dzin // shes rab chen pos
NK103(pe)006:665: bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa mi dmigs pa'i
NK103(pe)006:666: spyod pa ni sa drug pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:667: sa bdun pa la chos nyid mi g.yo ba yi don rtogs pa'i lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:668: dmigs med kyi don la mi zad mdzod kyi ting 'dzin dang /
NK103(pe)006:669: nang du yang dag 'jog las mi g.yo bar spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:670: sa brgyad pa la gnyis med kyi ye shes la rig pa rnal du phebs pa'i lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:671: 'byung ba chen po lnga la gzhal yas dang lhar
NK103(pe)006:672: sprul pa'i ting 'dzin dang spang blang med pa brtul
NK103(pe)006:674: sa dgu pa la dbyings ye shes gnyis med chos dbyings gdal ba nyid kyi lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:675: rtog pa rnams lha'i dal du rnam par dag ste rang bzhin med pa dbyings kyi ting 'dzin dang /
NK103(pe)006:676: 'dod yon la dbang sgyur ba thabs kyi spyod pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:677: sa tha ma la rang byung ye shes 'ba' zhig
NK103(pe)006:678: las sel med pas gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba
NK103(pe)006:679: dang / thams cad mkhyen pas snang gsal ye 'phyo'i
NK103(pe)006:680: ting 'dzin dang bya btsal med par lhun gyis grub
NK103(pe)006:681: dang / pa'i spyod pa'o // sa bcu po de
NK103(pe)006:682: la rnal 'byor phra mo bzhi bcu ru gyes ste
NK103(pe)006:683: dang / pa'i spyod pa'o // // sa dang po
NK103(pe)006:684: la rnal 'byor drug ste lha dang mi rtog pa
NK103(pe)006:685: bsgom pa la 'dun pa tsam la sems pa'i rnal
NK103(pe)006:686: dang / pa'i spyod pa'o // // 'byor pa nyid
NK103(pe)006:687: // bsnyung bar gnas pa'i sems ni brgyad kyi dang
NK103(pe)006:688: po ste sa bon ltar dang de nas pha ma
NK103(pe)006:689: nye du lta bu la sbyin pa byed de myu
NK103(pe)006:690: dang / pa'i spyod pa'o // // 'byor pa nyid
NK103(pe)006:691: // gu bu dang // lta spyod sngags kyi tshul
NK103(pe)006:692: du bcos ma'i rnal 'byor nyid snying rje ba dag
NK103(pe)006:693: la sbyin pa'i gnas su gtong ste sdong bu lta
NK103(pe)006:694: dang / pa'i spyod pa'o // // 'byor pa nyid
NK103(pe)006:695: // gu bu dang // bu dang // sngags dang
NK103(pe)006:696: tshul gzhan phra men du spyod pa'i rnal 'byor nyid
NK103(pe)006:697: dge sbyong dag la gtong ba lo ma ltar dang
NK103(pe)006:698: dang / pa'i spyod pa'o // // 'byor pa nyid
NK103(pe)006:700: la mos pas de'i tshul rtags 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:701: nyid bla ma dang rol mo mkhan la lhug par
NK103(pe)006:702: gtong ba'i sems ni me tog ltar dang de nas
NK103(pe)006:703: gang 'dod pa gtong bas 'bras bu lta bu dang
NK103(pe)006:704: drug sbyin pa'i bslab pa la //
NK103(pe)006:705: lha dang mi rtog bsgom pas mos ba'i rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:706: nyid sbyin pas rgyu byas nas tshul khrims srung ba
NK103(pe)006:707: la mos pa'i sems bskyed de bsrung ba gsos su
NK103(pe)006:709: the tshom med pas dge bar 'dun bar byed pa'i
NK103(pe)006:710: rnal 'byor nyid de bas kyang lha la mchod pa
NK103(pe)006:711: phul bas she stobs can du 'gyur snyam nas tshangs
NK103(pe)006:712: pa la sogs pa mchod pa ste 'jig rten pa'i
NK103(pe)006:713: lam brgyad ces kyang de ka nyid la bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:714: 'jig rten phal pa'i sems brgyad la brten nas stong
NK103(pe)006:715: pa nyid kyi sems skye ba'i gzhi la rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:717: bde gshegs dang bla ma'i bka' la sdod pas rigs
NK103(pe)006:718: nges te sgo gsum bya ba'i las kyi rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:719: la brten // sngar sngags la ma spyad pas thog
NK103(pe)006:720: mar spyod las dang po'i las can gyi rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:721: pas stong par bdag dag par bsgom 0pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:722: sngags la bslab pa sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor bar byed pa pos byas par yid la spyod cing //
NK103(pe)006:723: sngags kyi bslab pa la mi 'gyur ba'i bsam pas
NK103(pe)006:724: nges pa'i rnal 'byor rgyu med pa las 'bras bu
NK103(pe)006:725: grub par lta ste bsam spyod dag ma dag gnyis
NK103(pe)006:726: ka yod do // gal chen sbyong ba'i sa la
NK103(pe)006:727: rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor nyid de gong gi
NK103(pe)006:728: log lta de dag sel cing //
NK103(pe)006:729: nyon mongs pa sgrib pa rags pa 'joms pas gyen
NK103(pe)006:730: du 'byung ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rigs chen 'byed
NK103(pe)006:732: sbyor ba'i lam la gnas pa'i bslab pa rgyun gyi
NK103(pe)006:733: sa la rnal 'byor gsum ste gsang sngags mtshon pa'i
NK103(pe)006:734: sgo lung gi rnal 'byor zab mo la brten cing
NK103(pe)006:735: bsgoms pas // drod g.yo ba tsam thob pa la
NK103(pe)006:736: bslab pa'i mtha' bcu mi 'bral bar bslabs pa yis
NK103(pe)006:737: rtse mor rtogs pa'i ye shes 'phel ba dang //
NK103(pe)006:738: chos nyid mnyam pa chen po gsang sngags kyi don
NK103(pe)006:739: la mi skrag cing bzod pa thob pas ngo mtshar
NK103(pe)006:740: skye ba'o // bslab pa bcu'i spyod 0pa la dus
NK103(pe)006:741: rgyun du gnas pa gyi rnal 'byor gyis ye shes
NK103(pe)006:743: mtshan 0ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor la dbye na sems nyid rtogs goms kyi drod rtags yin te //
NK103(pe)006:744: g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor ba la gnas pa dang /
NK103(pe)006:745: thob pa'i rnal 'byor nas ldan pa dang /
NK103(pe)006:746: de mi 'gyur ba brtan pa'i rnal 'byor te drod
NK103(pe)006:747: la gsum rtags la'ang de ltar gsum ste rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:748: drug / gzhi bo'i rnal 'byor gsum dang don la rnal 'byor dgur gnas pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:749: bsod nams gter gyi sa la gong gi bslab pa
NK103(pe)006:750: bcu'i spyod pa dang ma bral ba'i rgyun gyi rnal
NK103(pe)006:751: 'byor nyid de // gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma rags
NK103(pe)006:752: pa dag pas thun mong gi 'jig rten chos mchog
NK103(pe)006:753: lta bu ste zag bcas kyi bslab pa bcu bskyed
NK103(pe)006:754: du byar med pas mthar phyin pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:755: sa drug pa la rnal 'byor bdun te 'khor ba'i
NK103(pe)006:756: duhkha la ngal sos pas dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal
NK103(pe)006:758: bdag gnyis med pa'i don ji lta bar rtogs pas
NK103(pe)006:759: thun mong byang chub sems dpa'i mthong lam sa rab
NK103(pe)006:760: tu dga' ba lta bu ste lta ba mnyam pa
NK103(pe)006:762: sngags kyi rigs chen 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas sa gnyis pa dri ma dang bral te med pa'i //
NK103(pe)006:763: mnyam rdzogs chen po'i rnal 'byor ni bden pa gnyis
NK103(pe)006:764: mnyam par rdzogs pa sa gsum pa 'od byed pa'o
NK103(pe)006:765: // nges par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni gsang ba
NK103(pe)006:766: ji bzhin ba thugs su chud nas don mdzad pas
NK103(pe)006:768: rtsal chen sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor ni shes rab kyi
NK103(pe)006:769: rtsal chen pos dbyer med kyi don la sbyong bas
NK103(pe)006:770: sa lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:771: rig pas chos nyid ji bzhin pa'i yul la 'jug
NK103(pe)006:772: pa'i rnal 'byor sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa'o
NK103(pe)006:773: // ye shes chen po yul med du rtogs pas
NK103(pe)006:774: rig par sgom lam la sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor sa
NK103(pe)006:775: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag pas sa bdun pa
NK103(pe)006:777: 'dir de dag mthong lam gyi khyad par du gyur par rig par bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:778: sa bdun pa la rnal 'byor gsum ste chos nyid
NK103(pe)006:779: rig pa la grub pa'i don rnal ma la 'byor
NK103(pe)006:780: 0pa ni // mtshan ma las grol te cis kyang
NK103(pe)006:781: mi g.yo bar gnas pas sa brgyad pa mi g.yo
NK103(pe)006:782: 0pa ni // ba'o // de bas kyang bskyed du
NK103(pe)006:783: gyur te legs pa cher ldan pa la rnal 'byor
NK103(pe)006:784: chen po 1ni sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros
NK103(pe)006:786: ba'i rnal 'byor ni de nyid chos kyi gzhir gnas
NK103(pe)006:787: pas sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin chen yin te
NK103(pe)006:789: pa dang ye shes pa 'byed cing 'phro 'du byed
NK103(pe)006:790: pas phyi rgyud kri ya 0u pa ya 1yo ga
NK103(pe)006:792: // sa brgyad pa la rnal 'byor gsum ste blang
NK103(pe)006:793: dor med pa rmad du byung ba'i spyod par rol
NK103(pe)006:795: rnal 'byor chen po bskyed pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:796: ci spyad tshogs chen gnyis su shes te 'dus 'dun
NK103(pe)006:797: pas 'i rnal 'byor ni bskyed pa'i rdzogs par rdzogs
NK103(pe)006:798: la // lta spyod 'brel ba'i rig pa'i rtsal chen
NK103(pe)006:799: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni bskyed pa'i rdzogs pa chen
NK103(pe)006:800: po ste rgya'i rig sa 'dzin no //
NK103(pe)006:801: sa dgu pa la rnal 'byor gsum ste 'dod yon
NK103(pe)006:802: lnga chos nyid kyi rgyan du spyad pas rol pa
NK103(pe)006:804: rdzogs pa'i bskyed pa ste rtsol ba dang bcas rnal 'byor yin la //
NK103(pe)006:805: nyon mongs sdug bsngal bde chen du gsal bas bde
NK103(pe)006:806: ba chen po'i rnal 'byor ni rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa
NK103(pe)006:807: dngos yin cing // de brtan pas ye shes kyi
NK103(pe)006:808: thig ler rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni rdzogs pa'i rdzogs
NK103(pe)006:809: pa chen po'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:810: de dag kyang rgya chen rigs 'dzin no //
NK103(pe)006:811: sa tha ma la rnal 'byor phra mo gsum ste
NK103(pe)006:812: thams cad rang byung ye shes su rtogs pas bdag
NK103(pe)006:814: rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par la bzla ba ste //
NK103(pe)006:815: de la thams cad ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub
NK103(pe)006:816: pa'i rnal 'byor ni rjes su rnal 'byor pa nyid
NK103(pe)006:818: tha snyad la mi gnas te gang yang ma bkol
NK103(pe)006:819: bas klong yangs chub pa'i rnal 'byor ni de yis
NK103(pe)006:820: gshis mthong pas lhun grub rig 'dzin rang rgyud dag
NK103(pe)006:822: de las sems bskyed nas mthar thug gi don la reg par 'dod pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:823: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pas don thun mong min par brda sprad nas //
NK103(pe)006:824: phyogs med rang grol du rtogs pa'i ngang du gnas pas //
NK103(pe)006:825: ched du ma gtad kyang de'i ngang du ma yengs par gsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)006:826: dmigs gtad kyis bsgom du med kyang don la ma yengs pas sgom pa'i gzer chen po yin no //
NK103(pe)006:827: gdod ma nas snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud nyid //
NK103(pe)006:828: las gzhan pa med pas yengs 1teng nge dang bral 1ba'i 11dogs pa med //
NK103(pe)006:829: don 'di ni mthar phyin pas shin tu rnal mar blo yis 'byor te //
NK103(pe)006:830: rtsol sgrub kyis btsal ba bral ba'i thabs chen po yin no //
NK103(pe)006:831: thog mar rang kharig rnal ka'byor pa'i gapas //
NK103(pe)006:832: rtogs pa'i lta ba'i phyogs ris dang bral bar nges pa'i sor //
NK103(pe)006:833: blos ma bcos par lhun gyis grub pa'i bde ba chen por gnas te //
NK103(pe)006:834: ma yengs par gnas pa tsam de nyid la sgom zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:835: bying 2ba nang du blo rgod 1pa'i yul la 'phro
NK103(pe)006:836: ba dang thim pa ni skyon gyis cir yang g.yos
NK103(pe)006:837: kyang // thog ma gzhi'i don dgag sgrub med pa dang de rtogs pa'i gnad //
NK103(pe)006:838: des na spang ba dang dgag pa dang sbyang ba dang bsgyur ba min te //
NK103(pe)006:839: de nyid rtogs tshod du rang tang du gnas so //
NK103(pe)006:840: sgo lnga yul gcod par byed 1pa ni nyon yid
NK103(pe)006:841: nga bdag tu 'dzin byed 3 ni yid snga phyi'i
NK103(pe)006:843: rnam pa sgyu 2ma dang mtshan nyid rang 4rig dang rang bzhin stong 6nyid yin pas //
NK103(pe)006:845: des na re dogs kyis ma btsal bar lhug par zhog cing //
NK103(pe)006:846: so ma shor skyon ma bcos 'bras bu btsal ba med pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:847: ngag tu brjod pa la gsum byung pa ste don la dbyer med pas //
NK103(pe)006:848: de gsum tha dad kyi rjes su sems mi spro bas //
NK103(pe)006:849: thig le rang gsal nyag gcig go //
NK103(pe)006:850: bying bas rig pa gsal ma thon //
NK103(pe)006:851: rmugs pas shes bya'i don gnas lugs ma gsal //
NK103(pe)006:852: shin tu bying na dran pa'i rgyun 'gag /
NK103(pe)006:853: rab tu rmugs na 'du shes kyi rgyu ba spang //
NK103(pe)006:854: rgod pa ni rig pa rang rang gi yul la 'phro //
NK103(pe)006:855: g.yeng ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bya ba'i las kyis khrid //
NK103(pe)006:856: rab tu rgod na rtog dpyod yid la byed //
NK103(pe)006:857: shin tu bya bas g.yengs na bya byed kyi mtshan mar smin no //
NK103(pe)006:858: thog ma med pa'i mun pa ma rig pa'i bag chags dang //
NK103(pe)006:859: bcud can gyi kha zas bza' ba drags pa dang gnas dang gos kyi rkyen gyis 'thibs pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:860: bad kan gyi nad rgyas pa dang ngal dub kyi las drags pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:861: gdams pa'i gnad zhan pa dang sbyangs pa'i rgya chung ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:862: skye bo 'dus pa la lta ba dang 'jig rten gyi bya ba ma mthong pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:863: bslabs pa'i tha snyad la bsam pa'i shes rab kyis dran pa rgyud la bsten pa dang //
NK103(pe)006:864: bems po dang rig pa'i sgron ma lung gis rgyud g.yengs pa ste //
NK103(pe)006:865: mdor na rang gi rig pa srang du ma tshud pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:866: gtan tshigs kyis gzhig dpes mtshon lung la rgyud sbyangs te yid ches par byas la //
NK103(pe)006:867: kha zas bsil ba dang rtsub pa dang yang bas
NK103(pe)006:868: mkhris pa rlung bad kan gyi khams bsnyam bsil ba'i
NK103(pe)006:869: sar gnas te snga dro bad kan gyi //
NK103(pe)006:870: dus su bcag cing phung po la spyod pa drag dal snyoms par gnas //
NK103(pe)006:871: shes bya tshogs brgyad skye lugs gsum lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)006:872: du rgya gcad mngon sum gnyis kyi tshad mas mtshon
NK103(pe)006:873: // sgrol ma rlung gis rnam par shes pa bteg la gzeng bstod de bsgom par bya //
NK103(pe)006:874: bla ma dam pa'i yon tan dran pas don gyis ting nge la brod pa ltar gsal gdab //
NK103(pe)006:875: las rgya mtshan ldan gyi grogs kyis spyod lam ci bder spyad pas khams 'dus dgrol //
NK103(pe)006:876: shes pa rgya bskyed la ngo mtshar can gyi yul la drang //
NK103(pe)006:877: gnad kyi gdams pa shes bya'i gshis la phebs pas skyon dbang du 'gro ba'i lam gcad //
NK103(pe)006:878: 'jug pa'i sgo theg pa rnams bsdur bas nges pa'i don gnad du phebs la //
NK103(pe)006:879: skye bo 'dus pa'i tshogs la lta ba dang 'jig rten gyi bya ba mang po gzhag /
NK103(pe)006:880: lung mang 'dod pa'i khyad par sngar thos bsam gyis bcad la //
NK103(pe)006:881: sgom pa 'di'i tshe bsam byung so sor rtog pa'i dus min pas rtog dpyod kyi kho thag gcad //
NK103(pe)006:882: ha cang g.yengs na rig pa'i rta rlung dang bral //
NK103(pe)006:883: las kyi rnam smin ngan pa'i 'bras bu du kha dran pas rang la rang gis she gcad //
NK103(pe)006:884: dus snyigs pa dang tshe thung ba dran pa'i dad pas rig pa srang du gzung ngo //
NK103(pe)006:885: bzhag thabs de ltar du blo gnas na nyams rim
NK103(pe)006:886: bzhi dang po sems gnas pa tsam gyi nyams 'byung
NK103(pe)006:887: ste // a ti'i skal ba dang ldan kyang chig
NK103(pe)006:888: chod pas blo zhan pas lta ba dang rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)006:889: tshad la dgon par goms par byed pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)006:890: mnyam pa la mi sdod par slar rtog pa mang
NK103(pe)006:891: po 'byung ste bying rgod kyi rkyen dang bral bar
NK103(pe)006:892: cung zad gnas pa la gnas zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)006:893: res gnas res bral bas spriin bar gyi nyi ma
NK103(pe)006:894: dang 'dra la sgom la yid ches pas thob tu
NK103(pe)006:896: cing de la yid ches pa'i dad pas 'khor ba
NK103(pe)006:897: la blo ldog cing skyo bas chags pa chung sems
NK103(pe)006:899: de ltar snang bas 'khor ba'i g.yang sa ngan 'gro
NK103(pe)006:900: mi ltung bar mi lus thob nas las kyi 'brel
NK103(pe)006:901: pas rnal ma dang 'phrad pa tsam las //
NK103(pe)006:902: zil gnon ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chung bas srid
NK103(pe)006:903: pa 'khor ba las brgal ma nus pa yin no
NK103(pe)006:904: // sngar gnas pa'i nyams thob pa'i stobs kyis skyon
NK103(pe)006:905: rnams rang bral nas nyin mtshan phyad par mi rtog
NK103(pe)006:906: thig le'i ngang la gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:907: rgya mtsho chen po'i gting dang 'dra bar mi g.yo
NK103(pe)006:908: la rmi rtags bzang po 'byung rtags gzhan yang rab
NK103(pe)006:910: thod rgal du ma song bas blo zhan brtag pa'i mtha' bzung zhing zhen pa'i bag la nyal dang //
NK103(pe)006:911: ma bral bas zag bcas kyi goms pa'i stobs mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'o //
NK103(pe)006:912: 'khor ba dang 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dbyer med kyi ngo bor son par mdzad pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:913: ngos gzung ji lta bur yang mi gnas par gzigs
NK103(pe)006:914: te rtsol ba las 'das pa'i don mthar phyin pa
NK103(pe)006:916: rtags dang mtshan ma bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs
NK103(pe)006:917: la tshe 'pho ba las 'das te rigs 'dzin du
NK103(pe)006:918: bgrod du med par gnas pas tshe 'di la 'tshang
NK103(pe)006:919: rgya'o // rjes thob cung zad mnga' bas tshul bzang po'i rtsol ba can no //
NK103(pe)006:920: rang gi sems nyid chos kyi sku ru zhal mjal bas mthar phyin pa ni //
NK103(pe)006:921: dpe yis mtshon du med pa nyid nam mkhas mtshon te mtha' dbus las 'das pas so //
NK103(pe)006:922: rtsol ba med pa'i byin rlabs gdul bya'i yul sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyis cir yang 'char //
NK103(pe)006:923: de las bskyed du byar med kyang phyogs ris dang bral zhing rang gsal bas nyams su gdags so //
NK103(pe)006:924: nyams de rnams rim pa ji bzhin du bzhi po ma lus par tshang bar byung ba la yang //
NK103(pe)006:925: de'i dus la nges pa med de brtson 'grus kyi
NK103(pe)006:926: stobs dang rig pa'i rtsal che chung yod pas so
NK103(pe)006:927: // thod rgal gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig la lar
NK103(pe)006:928: gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin nas mthar phyin pa'i nyams
NK103(pe)006:930: dga' rab bdag dang 'dra ba nges par phyis 'byung na rtogs grol chig chod yon no //
NK103(pe)006:931: man ngag 'di ni mchog gi dngos grub khyad par can dam pa'i bcud yin la //
NK103(pe)006:932: 'khor 'das kyi chos mtshan nyid 'dzin po'o cog thams cad //
NK103(pe)006:933: gdod ma nas rang bzhin ma bcos pa byang chub kyi sems yin //
NK103(pe)006:934: bde gshegs dus 'das da ltar ma 'ongs pa gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad yi //
NK103(pe)006:935: thugs kyi dgongs pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin te //
NK103(pe)006:936: ma nor rnal ma'i don la rig pas 'byor pa'i //
NK103(pe)006:937: blo gros yang rab skyes bu'i bsam pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa nyid //
NK103(pe)006:938: rgyu rkyen 'dus nas byas pa min pas dus gsum
NK103(pe)006:939: 'pho 'gyur skye 'gag gnas pa dang bral bas brtan
NK103(pe)006:940: pa // mtshungs pa med pa'i gsal mkhyen khyad par can yin //
NK103(pe)006:941: gdod ma nas gnas pas cing kyang bskyod pa med pas 'dus ma byas //
NK103(pe)006:942: sgro skur dang bral bas nges pa'i don gyi lung nyid //
NK103(pe)006:943: skal ldan rnams la bstan cing bzhag pa yin no //
NK103(pe)006:944: de lta bu'i don khyad par can la ngam pa e ma ho /
NK103(pe)006:945: skal khaba dang ldan skyes bu rnams //
NK103(pe)006:946: ma ka'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba dag ga /
NK103(pe)006:947: rgyal ba'i bka' lung zab mo la //
NK103(pe)006:948: brgyud pa'i brda don sprod pa'i man ngag gi gnyer dang ldan pas //
NK103(pe)006:949: gzhi'i don bden par ye nas gnas pa yi //
NK103(pe)006:950: yon tan gyi gzer tsam zhig mthong bas nga rgyal skyes pa la //
NK103(pe)006:951: mthong ba tshe 'di'i dgos pa 'ga' yis rkyen //
NK103(pe)006:952: bya ba med pa'i chos la blo gtad nas //
NK103(pe)006:953: dad ldan skal ldan gyi blo byin gyis brlabs pas //
NK103(pe)006:954: dngos grub kyi chu bo rtogs goms kyi rgyun ma bcad par //
NK103(pe)006:955: bla ma rin chen gyi snyan khung brgyud pa don
NK103(pe)006:956: mtshon pa'i tshig /'di la rten la goms pa tshad
NK103(pe)006:957: la phob // 'di dang bral na skye bo nyid //
NK103(pe)006:959: pa'i skyon des na skal ba dang ldan pa gdams ngag rin chen gyi ten //
NK103(pe)006:960: dal 'byor lus 'di dgos pa phra mor ma spyad par //
NK103(pe)006:961: man ngag 'di yis 'bras bu grub pa'i grogs mchog mdzod cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)006:962: 'gro ba drug rnams skye ba rdzus mngal sgong drod
NK103(pe)006:963: gsher bzhi'i sdug bsngal d+r+wa bar dus rtag tu 'jug
NK103(pe)006:965: 'byung ba rgyu ni mtshungs ldan ma rig lhan cig
NK103(pe)006:966: byed pa bdag lta nyer len nyon mongs rnam smin
NK103(pe)006:967: gyi rgyu las kyi 'khor lo ste //
NK103(pe)006:968: bde ba 'joms pa'i dgra de dag las rgyal bar
NK103(pe)006:969: mdzad pa sku gsum brgyud pa'i bka' la brten pa'i
NK103(pe)006:970: // gdams pa 'di yis yid kyi mun pa ma
NK103(pe)006:971: rig pa bsal nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK103(pe)006:972: mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan tshugs //
NK103(pe)006:973: 'jam dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos bu dang
NK103(pe)006:974: dga' rab bdag dang rigs mthun skal ldan mos 'jug
NK103(pe)006:976: gdams pa 'di la nan tan cher gyis dad brtson
NK103(pe)006:977: dam tshig yod na 'di sems la thums shig par
NK103(pe)006:978: gdams pa'o // sgom pa'i thabs mtshon par byed pa'i
NK103(pe)006:979: rin po che sgron ma lta bu rnal 'byor pa
NK103(pe)006:980: gdams pa'o // sgrub pa'i grogs / rdzogs so////rgya gar
NK103(pe)006:981: gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ba ta dang
NK103(pe)006:982: gdams pa'o // sgrub pa'i grogs / / bod kyi
NK103(pe)006:983: lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa nas yul
NK103(pe)006:984: d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing bsgyur te
